Long dress in a patterned weave with a slight sheen. Short sleeves with a flounced trim, seam at the waist with a tie belt, and a wide skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and decorative flounce. Seam and flare to the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.

Leather jacket in a straight style with a detachable tie belt. Collar, hook-and-eye fastening, concealed zip down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest pocket and two flap pockets. Lined.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with embroidered details. High waist, low crotch, button fly and straight legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist with wide ribbing at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.

Fully lined halterneck swimsuit in a narrow cut at the front with ties at the back of the neck. Open back and deep opening at the front with frill-trimmed edges.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with a regular waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Knee-length dress in silk with a lightly brushed finish. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover, short, wide sleeves, seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in patterned silk with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, gathered sleeves with a slit and ties at the ends, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumpsuit in mulberry silk with a V-neck, double, narrow shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fitted jacket in a linen weave with notch lapels, a button at the front and jetted front pockets. Button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Jumpsuit in patterned silk satin with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, a concealed zip at the base of the back and wide, ankle-length legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.

Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed finish. Print motif on the front, concealed press-studs at the shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip at the front, an outer compartment with a zip at the back, and two inner compartments. Adjustable waist strap with plastic fasteners. Lined. Size 5x15.5x26.5 cm.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip at the front, an outer compartment with a zip at the back, and two inner compartments. Adjustable waist strap with plastic fasteners. Lined. Size 5x15.5x26.5 cm.
V-neck blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Partly lined.
V-neck blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Partly lined.

Loose-fitting, high-waisted trousers in a textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with a box pleat, and adjustable tab with press-studs at the hems.
V-neck tunic in an airy weave with pleats at the front, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in an organic cotton weave with a chest pocket, elastication at the back and an opening with press-studs at the crotch in sizes 4-12M. Shoulder straps that have decorative knot details at the front and cross at the back with concealed buttons at the ends. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with detachable ties, gathers in the sides for best fit and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with detachable ties, gathers in the sides for best fit and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in organic cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs. Concealed press-studs on one shoulder, a balloon-shaped tulle skirt with pompoms inside, and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in an organic cotton weave with a bow.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, narrow-striped organic slub cotton jersey with a button placket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a drawstring at the waist.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
